statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, device_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, value ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND timestamp > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(id) AS total_data_points FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 100;
SELECT device_id, MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY max_value DESC, min_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch';
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM WearableDevices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM WearableDevices WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender FROM ResearchParticipants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices;
SELECT device_type, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM WearableDevices WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT participant_id, age, gender FROM ResearchParticipants WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, timestamp FROM WearableDevices WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_type, sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM WearableDevices GROUP BY device_type, sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices;
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_data FROM SensorDataArchive WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subject_name, age, gender FROM ResearchSubjects WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, MAX(sensor_data) AS max_value FROM SensorDataArchive GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM WearableDevices WHERE sensor_type='Accelerometer';
SELECT device_name, sensor_data FROM WearableDevices WHERE sensor_data > 50;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE sensor_type='Heart Rate' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subject_name, age, gender FROM ResearchSubjects WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, AVG(data) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM device WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT study_name, end_date FROM research_study ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT id, gender, age FROM participant WHERE study_id=1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, AVG(data) AS average_data FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM device WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM research_study WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT p.gender, COUNT(p.id) AS participant_count FROM participant p JOIN research_study rs ON p.study_id = rs.id WHERE rs.study_name = 'Health Study' GROUP BY p.gender;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT users.username, users.email, research_projects.project_name FROM users JOIN research_projects ON users.user_id = research_projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch';

SELECT users.username, sensor_data.sensor_type, sensor_data.sensor_value FROM users JOIN wearable_devices ON users.user_id = wearable_devices.user_id JOIN sensor_data ON wearable_devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id WHERE sensor_value > 100;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(project_data.data_id) AS data_count FROM research_projects JOIN project_data ON research_projects.project_id = project_data.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING data_count > 10 ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%Health%' OR project_name LIKE '%Fitness%' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
